questiontext.text: Which of the following characteristics are continuous or discrete stochastic variables?  I. The speed of a vehicle on a highway. II. The number of accidents last year on a highway.

answer.text: I and II are both continuous stochastic variables.

feedback.text: I and II are both continuous stochastic variables…: Incorrect

answer.text: I is a discrete variable, but II is a continuous one.

feedback.text: I is a discrete variable, but II is a continuous one…: Incorrect

answer.text: I is a continuous variable, but II is a discrete one.

feedback.text: I is a continuous variable, but II is a discrete one…: Correct

answer.text: I and II are both discrete stochastic variables.

feedback.text: I and II are both discrete stochastic variables…: Incorrect
